alert.note: Alert for Catalina and Santa Barbara Islands; Malibu Coast; Western Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued January 08 at 9:04PM PST until January 11 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Northwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 to 70 mph possible. * WHERE...Catalina and Santa Barbara Islands, Malibu Coast and Western Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area. * WHEN...From Wednesday afternoon through Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down large objects such as trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for drivers of high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Catalina and Santa Barbara Islands; Malibu Coast; Western Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area
